WWUS71 KBOX 231345
NPWBOX

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE TAUNTON MA
945 AM EDT THU OCT 23 2014

MAZ007-232145-
/O.CAN.KBOX.HW.W.0003.000000T0000Z-141023T1400Z/
/O.EXA.KBOX.WI.Y.0014.000000T0000Z-141024T0300Z/
EASTERN ESSEX MA-
INCLUDING THE CITY OF...GLOUCESTER
945 AM EDT THU OCT 23 2014

...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING...
...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN TAUNTON HAS ISSUED A WIND
ADVISORY...WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING. THIS
REPLACES THE HIGH WIND WARNING WHICH WAS IN EFFECT.

* LOCATION...EASTERN ESSEX COUNTY.

* WINDS...NORTH 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH.

* TIMING...WINDS WILL DIMINISH THROUGH EARLY AFTERNOON...BEFORE
  ANOTHER ROUND OF STRONG WINDS ARRIVES LATE THIS AFTERNOON AND
  THIS EVENING.

* IMPACTS...STRONG WINDS MAY DOWN TREE LIMBS AND POWER LINES...
  RESULTING IN ISOLATED POWER OUTAGES. THE HEAVY RAIN COMBINED
  WITH FULLY LEAFED TREES WILL LIKELY EXACERBATE THE POTENTIAL
  FOR DOWNED TREE LIMBS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

DRIVING CAN ALSO BE DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH PROFILE
VEHICLES. BE ALERT FOR DOWNED TREE LIMBS ON ROADS. STAY CLEAR OF
DOWNED WIRES.

&&

$$

CTZ004-MAZ005-006-012>021-NHZ012-RIZ001>007-232145-
/O.CON.KBOX.WI.Y.0014.000000T0000Z-141024T0300Z/
WINDHAM CT-CENTRAL MIDDLESEX MA-WESTERN ESSEX MA-
SOUTHERN WORCESTER MA-WESTERN NORFOLK MA-SOUTHEAST MIDDLESEX MA-
SUFFOLK MA-EASTERN NORFOLK MA-NORTHERN BRISTOL MA-
WESTERN PLYMOUTH MA-EASTERN PLYMOUTH MA-SOUTHERN BRISTOL MA-
SOUTHERN PLYMOUTH MA-EASTERN HILLSBOROUGH NH-
NORTHWEST PROVIDENCE RI-SOUTHEAST PROVIDENCE RI-WESTERN KENT RI-
EASTERN KENT RI-BRISTOL RI-WASHINGTON RI-NEWPORT RI-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...PUTNAM...WILLIMANTIC...FRAMINGHAM...
LOWELL...LAWRENCE...MILFORD...WORCESTER...FOXBORO...NORWOOD...
CAMBRIDGE...BOSTON...QUINCY...TAUNTON...BROCKTON...PLYMOUTH...
FALL RIVER...NEW BEDFORD...MATTAPOISETT...MANCHESTER...NASHUA...
FOSTER...SMITHFIELD...PROVIDENCE...WEST GREENWICH...WARWICK...
BRISTOL...NARRAGANSETT...WESTERLY...NEWPORT
945 AM EDT THU OCT 23 2014

...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING...

* LOCATION...NORTHEAST CONNECTICUT...MUCH OF CENTRAL AND EASTERN
  MASSACHUSETTS AND RHODE ISLAND.

* WINDS...NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH.

* TIMING...WINDS WILL GRADUALLY DIMINISH THROUGH MIDDAY...BUT
  ANOTHER ROUND OF STRONG WINDS IS EXPECTED THIS AFTERNOON AND
  EVENING.

* IMPACTS...STRONG WINDS MAY DOWN TREE LIMBS AND POWER LINES...
  RESULTING IN ISOLATED POWER OUTAGES. THE HEAVY RAIN COMBINED
  WITH FULLY LEAFED TREES WILL LIKELY EXACERBATE THE POTENTIAL FOR
  DOWNED TREE LIMBS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

DRIVING CAN ALSO BE DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH PROFILE
VEHICLES. BE ALERT FOR DOWNED TREE LIMBS ON ROADS. STAY CLEAR OF
DOWNED WIRES.

&&

$$
